properties.name: otel.exporter.jaeger.endpoint
properties.description: Sets the endpoint for the Jaeger exporter. The default is `http://localhost:14250`.

properties.name: otel.exporter.jaeger.timeout
properties.description: Sets the maximum time, in milliseconds, that the Jaeger exporter waits for each batch export. The default is `10000`.

properties.name: otel.exporter.otlp.endpoint
properties.description: Sets the endpoint for the OpenTelemetry Protocol (otlp) exporter. The default is `http://localhost:4317`.

properties.name: otel.exporter.zipkin.endpoint
properties.description: Sets the endpoint for the Zipkin exporter. The default is `http://localhost:9411/api/v2/spans`.

properties.name: otel.sdk.disabled
properties.description: Enables tracing by MicroProfile Telemetry. The default is `true`.

properties.name: otel.service.name
properties.description: Sets of the name of the service that MicroProfile Telemetry is tracing.

properties.name: otel.exporter.otlp.endpoint
properties.description: Sets the endpoint for the OpenTelemetry Protocol (otlp) exporter. The default is `http://localhost:4317`.

values.description: The provider for the default operation name.

The operation name has the following form `<HTTP method>:<@Path value of endpoint’s class>/<@Path value of endpoint’s method>`. For example if the class is annotated with `@Path("service")` and method `@Path("endpoint/{id: \\d+}")` then the operation name is `GET:/service/endpoint/{id: \\d+}`.
